rules_text:
Flying
When Charming Siren leaves the battlefield, if it wasn’t blocking, you may bless target creature. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
When Left to the Sea enters, tap enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
